attributes.action: Grant the Visa of Care Worker Dependent Who don’t have Kids
attributes.additional_details: We urge the Parliament to direct the Home Office to grant visas to childless care worker dependents. Many are without children due to financial, health, or personal reasons. Family life should not be judged by having children. Those who arrived before rule changes now face unfair separation. Administrative reviews offer little hope. This harms well-being, mental health and contradicts UK values. Please act with compassion and fairness to keep families united and protect their rights.
attributes.background: Many care worker dependents are childless due to personal, financial, or health reasons. Recent visa changes now threaten to separate families who arrived before the rules changed.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may also wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/716517
